page.syntax: Real_Image_Name as C = .Get( Logical_Image_Name as C )

argument.name: Real_Image_Name
argument.description: The name of an existing image.

argument.name: Logical_Image_Name
argument.description: The name of the logical image associated with the existing image.

page.description: The .Get() method returns the name of the existing image that is mapped to a logical image name from the string dictionary.
page.example: dim ir as P dim nm as P ir = ImageResource.get() nm = ir.GetBitmapNameMap() nm.Initialize(<<%str% a5_control:browse=$a5_browse %str%) ? nm.get("a5_control:browse") = $a5_browse
